mapper.select: SELECT d.dish_id as dishId, d.name, d.price, d.status, d.image,sd.dict_code AS typeDictCode,sd.dict_label AS typeName FROM master_dishes d LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data sd ON d.type_dict_code = sd.dict_code AND d.status = #{status} AND d.type_dict_code = #{typeDictCode} AND d.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')

SELECT mdi.quantity,mdi.unit,mdi.is_required as isRequired,mdi.extra_price as extraPrice, mi.ingredient_name AS name, mi.ingredient_id as ingredientId FROM master_dish_ingredients mdi LEFT JOIN master_ingredients mi ON mdi.ingredient_id = mi.ingredient_id WHERE mdi.dish_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO master_dish_ingredients (dish_id, ingredient_id, quantity, unit, is_required, extra_price) VALUES (#{dishId}, #{material.ingredientId}, #{material.quantity}, #{material.unit}, #{material.isRequired}, #{material.extraPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT ingredient_name as name ,ingredient_id as ingredientId from master_ingredients ingredient_name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
